intellectual-property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual-property.description: The Tassadraft application and its content (texts, images, logos) are protected by copyright. Any reproduction or representation, in whole or in part, without written authorization is prohibited.
intellectual-property.disclaimer: Magic: The Gathering is a registered trademark of Wizards of the Coast. Tassadraft is neither affiliated with nor endorsed by Wizards of the Coast.

personal-data.title: Personal Data
personal-data.description: The information collected via the application is intended for managing subscriptions and improving services.
personal-data.rights: In accordance with the 'Informatique et Libertés' law and the GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, and delete your data.
personal-data.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at:

terms-of-use.title: Terms of Use (ToU)
terms-of-use.description: Using the application implies acceptance of the ToU available on our website.
details: Card recognition and deck management services are accessible through a paid subscription.
Pricing and terms are detailed in the ToU.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: Tassadraft strives to ensure the accuracy of the information provided. However, it cannot be held responsible for any errors or omissions, nor for the consequences of using this information.

hyperlinks.title: Hyperlinks
hyperlinks.description: The application may contain links to third-party websites. Tassadraft has no control over these sites and disclaims any responsibility for their content.

applicable-law.title: Applicable Law
applicable-law.description: This legal notice is governed by French law. In the event of a dispute, and after any attempt at amicable resolution has failed, the French courts shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

object.title: 1. Purpose of the Terms and Conditions
object.description: These Terms and Conditions of Use (T&Cs) govern access to and use of the Tassadraft application, available via web and mobile platforms. By using the application or associated services, you fully accept these T&Cs.

description.title: 2. Description of Services
description.description: Tassadraft is a platform for Magic: The Gathering (MTG) enthusiasts offering:
details: Recognition of MTG cards from photos (batch processing included).
Deck management and editing with support for multiple formats and personalized download with edition selection.
Tassadapi, a proprietary open API with documentation available at https://docs.tassadraft.com.

open-source.title: 2.1. Open Source
open-source.description:
The mobile and web applications are open-source clients developed with Svelte and built using Capacitor. 
The source code is publicly available under the MIT license at https://github.com/Tassadraft/Tassadraft-v2. 
Any contribution or reuse of the code must comply with the terms of the MIT license.

access.title: 3. Access Terms
object: Web: Full features (including payment) are accessible via the web version of the application.
Mobile: The mobile application offers similar features, except for payments, which are only available through the web version.
The application requires an Internet connection. Users are responsible for configuring their devices to access the services.

subscription.title: 4. Subscription Terms
subscription.description: Access to Tassadraft services requires a paid subscription, with the following options:

payment.title: 4.1. Payment
payment.description:
Payments are made exclusively via the web version of the application using the secure options provided. 
Prices include all applicable taxes.

end-subscription.title: 4.2. Renewal and Cancellation
end-subscription.renew: Subscriptions renew automatically unless canceled by the user at least 24 hours before the renewal date.
end-subscription.cancel: Cancellation does not entitle the user to a refund for the current period.

tassadapi.title: 5. Tassadapi API
tassadapi.description:
Tassadapi is a proprietary open API that allows interaction with Tassadraft's services. Its documentation is available at https://docs.tassadraft.com. 
Access to and use of the API must comply with the usage restrictions specified in the documentation and respect intellectual property rights.

user-responsibility.title: 6. User Responsibilities
object: Comply with applicable laws, including intellectual property rights.
Not use the application or API in a fraudulent or harmful manner (e.g., hacking, API abuse).

intellectual-propriety.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectual-propriety.api: Tassadapi API: Tassadapi is the exclusive property of Tassadraft. Any misuse, unauthorized reproduction, or distribution of API features is prohibited.
intellectual-propriety.clients: Web and Mobile Clients: The applications are open-source and distributed under the MIT license. Users must adhere to this license's terms when modifying or redistributing the code.

app-responsibility.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
app-responsibility.description: Tassadraft strives to provide an optimal experience but does not guarantee:
object: The absence of errors or bugs in the application.
Compatibility with all devices or browsers.
app-responsibility.tassadraft-not-responsible: Tassadraft is not liable for data loss, service interruptions, or indirect damages related to the use of its services.

collected.title: 9.1. Data Collected
object: Information provided by the user during registration (email, name, etc.).
Data related to feature usage (created decks, contact form submissions).

goals.title: 9.2. Purposes
goals.details: For more details, consult our [Privacy Policy].

contributions.title: 10. Contributions and Open Source
contributions.description: If a user contributes to the open-source code on GitHub, they agree to grant the necessary rights to Tassadraft in accordance with the MIT license terms. Tassadraft reserves the right to refuse or modify contributions.

support.title: 11. Support
support.description: For any questions, assistance, or complaints, fill out the contact form or, alternatively, email us at tassadapi@tassadraft.com.

cancellation.title: 12. Termination
cancellation.description: Tassadraft reserves the right to suspend or terminate access to the application and API in case of violation of the T&Cs.

update.title: 13. Changes to the T&Cs
update.description: These T&Cs may be modified at any time. Any changes will be notified via the application or website. By continuing to use the services after notification, you accept the new T&Cs.

right.title: 14. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
right.description: These T&Cs are governed by French law. Any disputes will be submitted to the competent courts in France.
